title: Action Learning-Based Web-Based Instruction (WBI) for Managerial Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expertise in scientific disciplines and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Mobile device utilization in BYOD environments, focusing on problem-solving learning for administrators

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world workplace problems and propose solutions by applying the action learning process on a web-based platform.
Learners improve their science-based managerial decision-making competencies by over 20% through peer feedback.
Learners apply over 80% of the knowledge acquired in a WBI (Web-Based Instruction) environment to their job settings upon completing the 4-week course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
